item.title: With Trump pressure and a 'new Lebanon,' can Hezbollah's shadow economy be dismantled?
item.description: "Hezbollah finds itself in its greatest predicament since its foundation," one regional expert told CNBC.

item.title: JPMorgan says fintech middlemen like Plaid are 'massively taxing' its systems with unnecessary pings
item.description: JPMorgan, the biggest U.S. bank by assets, is preparing to charge fintech middlemen such as Plaid and MX new fees for access to customer data.
